vlive.korean: [그리고 여기 숨은 노동자] 맛있죠? [Another hardworking lady] Yummy? 듣기 View video 아이돌룸(IDOL ROOM) : 커버여신이 나올 때까지 무한 스밍?!
조선 노동자들한테 얘기하잖아요. She speaks in front of Chosun workers. 듣기 View video 10PM : 김태훈, 정시우의 무비톡톡! Movie talk!talk!
vlive.english: She speaks in front of Chosun workers.

vlive.korean: '외국인 노동자에게 힘을 줘'. 화이팅. "Please cheer up this foreign worker". Cheer up. 듣기 View video INFINITE : 호야 뜻밖의 꿈방♣
vlive.english: "Please cheer up this foreign worker". Cheer up.

vlive.korean: 20대의 마지막을 슬프게 보내고 있는 노동자 처자입니다. I'm a sad working lady spending her last 20s. 듣기 View video IDOL x IDOL : KIXS - 키스 '매력발산 하고 있어~'
vlive.english: I'm a sad working lady spending her last 20s.

vlive.korean: 뭐 우리 얘기로는 이제 애교 노동자라고 불리우는 케이 양이 있잖아요. There's Kei who's great at acting cute. 듣기 View video 셀럽티비(Celuv.TV) : 보컬의 조화를 통하여 수많은 장르를 섭렵하는 러블리즈
vlive.english: There's Kei who's great at acting cute.

examples.korean: Two thirds of the workforce is / are women. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 노동자의 3분의 2가 여성이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Two thirds of the workforce is / are women. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He incited the workforce to come out on strike. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 노동자들에게 파업을 하러 나오도록 선동했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He incited the workforce to come out on strike. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The seamen went on strike in sympathy with the dockers. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 선원들이 부두 노동자들에게 동조하여 파업에 들어갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The seamen went on strike in sympathy with the dockers. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The new contracts have undermined the confidence of employees. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 새 계약 건이 노동자들의 신뢰를 흔들어 놓았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The new contracts have undermined the confidence of employees. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: We must harness the skill and creativity of our workforce. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 우리는 우리 노동자들의 기술과 창의력을 활용해야 한다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We must harness the skill and creativity of our workforce. Add to Wordbook
